name: A Death in the West
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 44  Compo (48hrs)

Last night there was a murder. You’re an undercover detective hired to catch the killer. You’ve narrowed it down to one final saloon. You have them cornered.

Talk to the patrons, takes notes, avoid detection and catch the killer!

How to play:

  • Chat options are on the right, select these to advance through the game.
  • When you think you have found some relevant information record it by clicking “Click to take note”.
  • View your notes by clicking “Click to view notes”.
  • Each action has a cost that will increase your risk of being uncovered, choose wisely.

Tools:

  • Unity / C#
  • Photoshop
  • Visual Studio
  • Audacity
  • Corsair Vengeance 2000 headset – Mic for recording.
